content:
The Google Doc isn't loading properly through web_fetch—I'm only getting the title. Google Docs renders content dynamically, so the extraction tool can't pull the actual text.

Three ways to get me the content:

1. **File → Download → Plain Text** and paste it here
2. **Share with edit access** (I can try browser automation to read it)
3. **Copy-paste the sections** you want me to focus on

Which works better for you?
